De'Shawn Waller 15 Yd Run (Corey McCullough Kick)
Neil McLaurin 55 Yd pass from Jack Abraham (Zac Everett Run for Two-Point Conversion)
Jack Abraham 14 Yd Run (Andrew Stein Kick)
Jaylond Adams 80 Yd Punt Return (Andrew Stein Kick)

videos.headline: Southern Miss's Adams sets tone with kickoff return TD
videos.description: Jaylond Adams gets Southern Mississippi on the board quickly as he returns Corey McCullough's opening kickoff 89 yards for a touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One Play (Southern Miss's Adams sets tone with kickoff return TD) 2019/08/31
